text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: It's insignificant enough that it won't be a problem. I've been reflecting on what I can do to make the Ligne Droite a success… in terms of what'd truly make the students happy.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: You don't feel that's the case already?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Well, it's just, perhaps I've only made myself happy. Bringing everyone together, making them act lively and dance… Leaving no one smiling but me, smug and self-righteous.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Do you think so? If anything, shouldn't you be more concerned with your own satisfaction?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Even if you do your utmost for the event, what the students get out of it is up to them. So all we can do is… give them a fantastic performance.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: But…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Kaichou, you know as well as I do that… you can't bring anyone excitement if your own heart isn't in it, right? You need to be the example.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Fuji Kiseki. I'm sorry, there's somewhere I need to go.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: That's fine, go ahead. You can always count on me, I'll be there.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Well then… Shakur, you can come out now. I know you were listening.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: You made me hear all that, more like. What do you think you're playing at?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I'm not playing… What kind of person do you all take me for…? I just thought that if you stayed to listen, you might get something out of it.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: We're going to light up this year's dance. If you have a little time later on, come over and watch us rehearse! I promise you won't regret it.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Ha, like hell you didn't play me. God… Whatever, now I know. Somebody caught on, and knows my identity.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: And they plan on using me to drag people to the dance? Talk about uncalled for. But… Memories, huh…

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Senpai! Thanks for helping us out with studying. You totally saved us for the next test.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: If you can call it that, yeah. You guys pretty much roped me into it. Dumbasses, what's gotten into you all?

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Wow, cold! Well like, it's that time of year. I wound up thinking about the future. Figured I should get some stuff out of the way.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Do I look like insurance? An escape route? Don't make me sick. Try that crap again with me and I'll ignore you.

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie B
text_block_list.text: A lot's been on my mind. Like, I don't wanna regret anything. Whatever happens, I want to be prepared. And I want to make some memories. And stuff…

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie B
text_block_list.text: I-I'm kidding! God, that's corny! We're gonna head back! Thanks for today!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: They're weak. Regrets can be suppressed. And memories are worthless to cling to.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hearts are complex, fickle things. I think we've both put up walls around our own.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: So? Why show up again? Don't tell me you're gonna get on your knees and plead.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Once again, I've come to ask a favor of you. Sirius Symboli, will you lend me a hand?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: …Huh?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I've taken your input into consideration. I've thought deeply about my intent… to celebrate this milestone, if it would make the students happy. And my conclusion, it is based in ego.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Then why did you return with the same exact request? If you recognize your own ego…?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I've decided to fight back, I suppose. I'll put it this way: I do want to feel fulfilled. I want to light the way for everyone, and for my ideals to bear fruit. So yes, I want all of that.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: And in order to do that, I need your help. My voice does reach quite far. However, there are limits to that too. Therefore…

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: So you want to use me, basically. God, you really… When you look down from your ivory tower, don't get carried away.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Well, whatever. I'll help you out. They're going to make their choice no matter what I say. That being said, I'm not doing this because of you, or for their benefit either.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: This is a reward for you acknowledging your self righteousness. Be grateful, so-called Emperor, Symboli Rudolf!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: And Sirius Symboli, I would like to invite you to attend as well. You're a student of Tracen Academy, and just as important.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Ha, was that on purpose? You really think you're going to convince me to come?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Oh, is the Emperor so stuffy she doesn't know how to invite someone? Would you like me to teach you the art of sweet talking?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …Heh.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Are you sure it wasn't me who taught you?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: But let's not waste the opportunity. Give me your hand, Sirius. We'll continue our lesson from all those years ago.

text_block_list.name: Rudolf
text_block_list.text: One, two, three! One, two, three! That's it! You're amazing, Sirius!

text_block_list.name: Sirius
text_block_list.text: I am, aren't I? Hey Rudolf, I'm gonna get even better. I'm the only person who can satisfy you, and you know it!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: You really haven't forgotten what I taught you. You're quite suited to following my lead.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Shut up, will you? And let me lead!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I can do that. But it's funny, I wonder why? Compared to our childhood, it's much more fun dancing with you now.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Look at her, all calm and composed. Even when we were kids, that attitude disgusted me.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: So? When do you plan on showing your face? Eavesdropping won't earn you any points with me.

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie B
text_block_list.text: U-Um, your dancing was just so amazing! I felt like I just stepped into a palace! Or something…

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Quit the small talk. What are you here for?
